import { createStore } from 'redux'; //  引入createStore方法

import reducer from './reducers';

sourcesContent:
import { createStore } from 'redux'  //  引入createStore方法
import reducer from './reducers'    
const store = createStore(reducer) // 创建数据存储仓库
export default store   //暴露出去
